title: Prohibits the inclusion of any advertisements in any mailing sent by the department of motor vehicles
summary: Prohibits the inclusion of any advertisement or other information in any mailing sent by the department of motor vehicles.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          617

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                 I N  A S S E M B L Y

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced by M. of A. SAYWARD, RABBITT, DUPREY, KOLB -- Multi-Sponsored
         by  --  M.  of  A.   BARCLAY, BURLING, CALHOUN, CROUCH, FINCH, GIGLIO,
         HAWLEY, JAFFEE, P. LOPEZ, V. LOPEZ, MAGEE, McDONOUGH, MOLINARO,  OAKS,
         SALADINO,  THIELE, WEISENBERG -- read once and referred to the Commit-
         tee on Transportation

       AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to  prohibiting
         the inclusion of any advertisements in any mailing sent by the depart-
         ment of motor vehicles

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. The vehicle and traffic law is  amended  by  adding  a  new
    2  section 224-b to read as follows:
    3    S  224-B.  PROHIBITION  OF  ADVERTISEMENTS  IN  CERTAIN INSTANCES. THE
    4  COMMISSIONER SHALL PROMULGATE NECESSARY RULES AND REGULATIONS TO PROHIB-
    5  IT THE INCLUSION OF ADVERTISEMENTS OR OTHER  COMMERCIAL  INFORMATION  IN
    6  ANY MAILINGS BY THE DEPARTMENT SENT TO THE RESIDENTS OF THE STATE.
    7    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.





        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01301-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to prohibiting the inclusion of any advertisements in any mailing sent by the department of motor vehicles
